content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to the latest financial figures and data, However, according to the last publicly available financial data from 2019-2020, the BBC2's budget was £445 million ($614 million). The funding for BBC2 comes from the UK government's annual budget and the BBC's Television License fee. Compared to other UK-based broadcast networks, BBC2's budget is relatively high as it is a public service broadcaster and has a wide range of programming, including documentaries, dramas, and news programs. Other UK-based broadcast networks, such as Channel 4, ITV, and Sky TV have different funding and revenue models from BBC2 and may have different budgets and funding sources.
